programme.title: Bowfinger

programme.desc: On the run from mercenaries, a fugitive (Vin Diesel) lands on a planet endangered by an invading ruler (Colm Feore) and his bloodthirsty army.(n)

programme.title: Timeline
programme.desc: Adventurers (Paul Walker, Frances O'Connor, Gerard Butler) travel back to 14th-century France to save a professor caught in the middle of a war.(n)

programme.title: Birth of the Dragon

programme.desc: A detective (Jack Nicholson) about to retire promises a woman that he will catch her daughter's murderer.(n)

programme.desc: An online game becomes terrifyingly real when its young players begin to die along with their onscreen characters.(n)

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: A man (Richard Gere) becomes increasingly distraught after he discovers his wife (Diane Lane) is having an affair with a Frenchman (Olivier Martinez).(n)

programme.title: Greta
programme.desc: Frances strikes up a seemingly harmless friendship with Greta, a lonely and kindly widow who enjoys her company. But when Greta's behavior becomes increasingly erratic and obsessive, Frances does whatever it takes to end the toxic relationship.(n)

programme.title: The Last Exorcism
programme.desc: While a film crew documents his final days as an exorcist, a deceitful cleric (Patrick Fabian) must summon true faith when he encounters real evil at a Louisiana farm.(n)

programme.desc: A suburban businessman (Kevin Bacon) becomes a vigilante after thugs kill his son during a gas station robbery.(n)

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A war veteran (Zac Efron) pursues a romance with the woman (Taylor Schilling) whose photograph he believes helped him survive his tour of duty in Iraq.(n)

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: Paranoia spreads among a team of Arctic researchers as they battle a deadly alien organism that assumes the shapes of its victims.(n)

programme.desc: A serial murderer will slaughter a captive doctor's (Cary Elwes) wife and daughter unless the man kills a fellow prisoner.(n)

programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.(n)

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: Renowned editor Maxwell Perkins (Colin Firth) develops a friendship with author Thomas Wolfe (Jude Law) while working on the writer's manuscripts.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A brilliant neuroscientist secretly tries to clone and create replicas of his family after a tragic car crash.(n)

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: A man (George Clooney) simultaneously struggles with the decision to pull the plug on his comatose wife while facing pressure from relatives to sell 25,000 acres of unspoiled Hawaiian land.(n)

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.(n)

programme.title: How to Make an American Quilt
programme.desc: A thesis and impending marriage weigh on a young woman (Winona Ryder) seeking sanctuary with a quilting circle of family and friends.(n)

programme.title: Sling Blade
programme.desc: A mentally impaired man (Billy Bob Thornton) with a violent past leaves the institution in which he has lived for many years and befriends a woman with a young son and an abusive boyfriend (Dwight Yoakam).(n)

programme.desc: A Chinese attorney (Bai Ling) defends a U.S. businessman (Richard Gere) accused of killing a model he spent the night with in Beijing.(n)

programme.desc: Three high-school friends make a discovery that gives them incredible superpowers, but their lives spin out of control when their darker sides begin to emerge.(n)

programme.desc: The citizens of the sleepy little town of Centerville find themselves under attack by flesh-eating zombies when the dead rise from their graves.(n)

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: The lives of two families collide when their children begin a relationship and it leads to a tragic accident.(n)

programme.title: The Operative

programme.title: Girl in Progress
